title: Reverse direction between two charged plates

content.question: A negatively charged particle initially in region I, as shown above, is accelerated from rest by an electric field of magnitude E0 between two parallel plates separated by a distance d. The particle then enters region II, the space between two parallel plates with a separation 2d and an electric field of magnitude 3E0 in the opposite direction. How far into region II does the particle travel before reversing direction?

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
